acceptHost(address).details: This function is used to accept the host candidate the tower gets the host fee

addStake().details: Only the tower can use this function for itself

clear().details: This function is used to clear the contract

params.hostRequestFee: The fee for requesting to be host to a tower
params.towerInitialStake: The initial stake of a tower

deleteHost(address).details: This function is used to delete a host from the tower

deleteTower().details: Only the tower can use this function for itself

params.blockTimeoutLimit: The block timeout limit of the task

returns._0: uint256 The fee of the tower
address[] The hosts of the tower
address[] The pending hosts of the tower
string The public connection of the tower
uint256 The size limit of the tower
uint256 The stake of the tower

penaltyForFailedTask(address,address).details: This function is used to penalize the tower for a failed task and send the penalty to the user

registerAsTower(uint256,string,uint256,u.details: This function is used to register as a tower the stake is inside the call

params.feeType: The type of the fee (0: fixed / 1: size / 2: time / 3: size and time)
params.publicConnection: The public connection of the tower
params.sizeLimit: The size limit of the tower

registerMeForTower(address).details: This function is used to register the sending host for the tower The host must pay a fee

rejectHost(address).details: This function is used to reject the host candidate the tower gets the host fee
